column1: The  main contention  put forward by the Petitioner is  that in the light of the
judgment  of the  Supreme  Court  in  Hiddelarachchi  vs  United  Motors  lanka  ltd

and  others 
2006  3  SlR  411,  the  1st  and  2nd  Respondents  were  legally  estopped
and  automatically ousted from proceeding with the inquiry under the Termination

of Employment of Workmen 
(Special  Provisions)  Act  No. 45  of 1971 ("TEWSPA"),
as  amended,  when  an  employee,  in  this  instance  the  3 rd  Respondent was  subject
